data.title: Retake B Mid Setup
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective Killjoy setup that counters mid lurks. This setup allows you to stall the bomb plant for B Site and lets you and your team rotate fast.

data.title: Aggressive Two Person Setup For A Site
data.description: This is a great two person setup for A Site to do when you want to try to get picks on enemy players pushing into A Site. Eco rounds, or rounds where a duelist on your team wants to get Aggressive on A Site are common examples of situations you might use this setup.

data.title: Right A Site To A Nest Nanoswarm
data.description: This lineup is useful both for stopping the Attackers from taking control of A Site, and for stopping the Attackers from peeking from A Tower post-plant.
